mapper.insert: insert into cart (user_id, product_id, product_qty) values (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{productQty})
mapper.select: select product_id, product_qty from cart where user_id = #{userId} and order_enable = 1
mapper.update: update cart set product_qty = #{productQty} where product_id=#{productId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where product_id=#{productId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update cart set order_enable = 1 where product_id=#{productId} and user_id=#{userId}
update cart set order_enable = 0 where product_id=#{productId} and user_id=#{userId}
